name: Pass.Locations
desc: An object that represents a location that the system uses to show a relevant pass.

items.name: altitude
items.desc: The altitude, in meters, of the location.

items.name: latitude
items.desc: The latitude, in degrees, of the location.

items.name: longitude
items.desc: The longitude, in degrees, of the location.

items.name: relevantText
items.desc: The text to display on the lock screen when the pass is relevant. For example, a description of a nearby location, such as “Store nearby on 1st and Main”.
